strings.string: How much bigger the virtual clock should be
Where the center of the spotlight should be. 0 is the center of the clock, 1 is the edge of the clock
Where the numbers should be positioned. 0 is the center of the clock, 1 is the edge of the clock
Whether or not to show the numbers for the hours
Font used for numbers. Some might break things on older watches.
Normal size number only Connect IQ font
Medium size number only Connect IQ font
Large size number only Connect IQ font
Huge size number only Connect IQ font
Normal size number only system font
Medium size number only system font
Large size number only system font
Huge size number only system font
